title: Facebook Price Target Raised On Ad-Growth Potential
text:
Apple Sees Car Revolution As GM, Ford Race To Adapt 
Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) CEO Tim Cook sees revolutionary changes coming to the auto industry amid a push toward self-driving cars, putting pressure on General Motors (NYSE:GM), Ford (NYSE:F) and other traditional automakers to adapt. Cook's comments came just a few weeks after GM said it will test ... 01:45 PM ET Modest Losses For Dow, S&P 500; Alphabet, Amazon Fall 
The Nasdaq bore the brunt of the selling in early afternoon trading in the stock market today. It fell 0.5%, while the S&P 500 lost 0.2%, and the Dow Jones industrial average eased less than 0.1%. Tuesday's NYSE and Nasdaq volumes were tracking slightly higher than Monday's levels. Alphabet ... 01:22 PM ET After Starbucks, Fiat Penalties, Will EU Slam Apple? 
The European Union's expected rulings that Starbucks (NASDAQ:SBUX) and Fiat Chrysler (NYSE:FCAU) got illegal tax breaks might be just the start of a crackdown, with bigger battles against Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) and Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) on the way. The rulings, which could be handed down Wednesday, may ... 01:08 PM ET Apple Music growth a wake-up call for Spotify 
Apple Music is off to a stronger start than expected, with the subscription streaming music service retaining 6.5 million users after their three-month free trial expired. Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) launched the service on June 30. It costs $9.99 a month for an individual account and $14.99 a month for a ... 12:22 PM ET Amazon, Alphabet, Priceline Are Bolting Past Market 
Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) and Google parent Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOGL) have been outrunning the overall market, sitting near new highs ahead of their earnings Thursday. Priceline (NASDAQ:PCLN) is also part of IBD's Bolting RS Lines Screen of the Day. The relative price strength line gauges a stock's ... 11:48 AM ET Tesla Stock Drops Fast As Model S Reliability Dinged 
Tesla Motors (NASDAQ:TSLA) stock plunged Tuesday as word spread about a critical view of its electric cars' reliability. Model S reliability "lags its high performance," review-site Consumer Reports said in its 2015 Annual Auto Reliability Survey report. Tesla stock was down 9.6% to 2016.15 in late ... 03:02 PM ET Gilead, Merck Hepatitis C Rivalry Heats Up 
Big biotech Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ:GILD) got a price-target increase Tuesday as big pharma Merck (NYSE:MRK) released new data on its hepatitis C regimen that could be a rival to Gilead's blockbuster franchise. Oppenheimer analyst Wendy Lam lifted her price target on Gilead to 124 from 120, writing ... 02:47 PM ET Apple Retakes Key Level As Stock Tries To Reboot 
Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) stock is retaking a key level in the stock market today. The consumer tech giant has been in a downtrend for about three months, but hasn't yet been able to pick up much momentum despite its record-breaking new iPhone launch last month. Shares rose 1.7% to 113.59 in ... 02:27 PM ET Fitbit signs up 20 new corporate wellness clients 
Fitbit (NYSE:FIT) stock did calisthenics Tuesday, jumping on news that the wearable fitness device maker added over 20 new enterprise customers for corporate wellness programs in the last four months. The company's business-to-business offering, Fitbit Wellness, signed up Aon Service Corporation, ... 02:13 PM ET EBay Q3: First Quarter Without PayPal May Be Downer 
EBay (NASDAQ:EBAY) might find it's a bit lonely without PayPal (NASDAQ:PYPL). The online marketplace posts its first results without its payments unit after the close Wednesday, and analysts expect declines on the top and bottom lines. Analysts project the e-commerce giant will report 40 cents in ... 01:35 PM ET
